name: CalendarValidator_adjustToTimeZoneTest
description: Unit tests for the adjustToTimeZone method in CalendarValidator.

test_cases.name: testAdjustToTimeZoneSameRules
test_cases.description: Tests that the time zone remains the same when adjusted to the same time zone.

test_cases.name: testAdjustToTimeZoneDifferentRules
test_cases.description: Tests that the time zone is updated correctly and the date and time components remain the same when adjusted to a different time zone.

test_cases.name: testAdjustToTimeZoneDifferentRulesWithDifferentDate
test_cases.description: Tests that the time zone is updated correctly and the date and time components remain the same when adjusted to a different time zone with a specific date set.
